intro: Hydriastele micrantha, commonly known as the small-flowered hydriastele, is a species of flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. Hydriastele micrantha thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Its botanical significance lies in its unique floral structure and ecological role within its native habitat.
